script.name: [TEST] [SELF SERVICE] Mac OS Upgrade - Big Sur
script.notes:
Created: 07/09/2021
This script was written by Joshua Roskos at JAMF: https://github.com/kc9wwh/macOSUpgrade Modifications: -- Modified the User Dialog message (line 146) -- Added Function: checkforBigSur (checks if the installed OS is on Big Sur) -- Added Function: checkHardware (checks if the device is compatible with Big Sur) -- Changed the "Unsuccessful Download" exit from 0 to 1 so we know when downloading the OS failed. (line 579)

parameters.parameter4: Path to the Mac OS installer
parameters.parameter9: Full Screen or Dialog Box (0 or 1)
